common_0090_rival_23:
Anyone can be a Pokémon Trainer as long as
they have Pokémon by their side![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_24:
And it’s our duty as Trainers to help our Pokémon
grow stronger through battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So, you ready to battle me,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_02:
Oye! Don’t get cold feet on me now! I wanna see
what you’ve got![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_03:
Perfecto! I’m so excited! For this battle,
I think I’ll use—[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I trust you remember that M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
is\r
wholly\r
inexperienced\r
in\r
Pokémon battling?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_rival_04:
Heh, whoops... Good call, Director.\c
I was about to send out one of my usual partners
right off the bat...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_05:
I guess I’ll take this chance to try out my new
buddy instead![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_06:
[VAR BD06(0000)]C’mon, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Let’s have us
a\r
fruitful\r
battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_07a:
Look at you, winning your first battle ever!
You’ve got even more potential than I thought!\r
You’re gonna be a strong Trainer for sure![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_07b:
Hey, if you can battle like that on your first try,
you definitely have what it takes to be a Trainer![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_08:
But now I want to try a different strategy!
Let’s go again—just one more battle![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)] and h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser
[VAR PKNAME(0001)]\r
are\r
surely\r
weary\r
already\r
from\r
that\r
last battle.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_rival_09:
Ah, sorry! I got kinda caught up in all the
excitement...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_10:
[VAR BD06(0000)]I’m really sorry, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
Same\r
to\r
your\r
[VAR PKNAME(0001)], too.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_11b: Oh, definitely! We’ll definitely battle more![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_04:
You two seem to be becoming fast friends,
though you’ve only just met.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_05:
Can I count on you to take your new schoolmate
here under your wing, Miss Nemona?\c
I’m sure [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she can learn a great deal from a
Champion-ranked Trainer, such as yourself.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_rival_13:
Oh, that reminds me! Since you’re new to training
Pokémon, there’s an app you definitely need![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_14:
You have a smartphone, right? Lemme see it
for a sec.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_system_01:
The [VAR COLOR(0006)]Pokédex app[VAR COLOR(0000)] was added to your
Rotom Phone!
common_0090_rival_15:
The Pokédex will automatically register any
Pokémon you catch.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_16:
It’s a must-have for Pokémon Trainers!\c
It’s a super handy app! Our homeroom teacher,
Mr. Jacq, actually made it himself![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_06:
Back in my day, we used ordinary paper and
handwritten notes to compile our Pokédexes.\r
It’s quite the age we live in now.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_rival_17:
Oof! Filling out a Pokédex by hand? I can’t even
imagine how much work that would take![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_07: Ohoho... No, I suppose you can’t.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_08:
Yet no matter how much the times may change,
the wonder of meeting new Pokémon never does.\r
That is a truly timeless pleasure.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_09:
And the more Pokémon that you encounter, the
more you’ll find yourself growing and changing.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_10:
I hope you will both work hard toward the goal
of completing your own Pokédexes.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_11:
Now, Miss Nemona, I do still have a few matters
to discuss with your parents.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_12:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Could I depend on you to see M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
to\r
the academy?\c
You would be doing me quite the favor.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_rival_18: Of course! Leave it to me![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_13: Then I leave h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer in your capable hands.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_head_teacher_14:
All right, little one. It’s time you and I were
on our way.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0090_rival_19:
Maybe I oughta make a little more time to work
on my Pokédex along with all my battling...[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_21:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Speaking of Pokédexes,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)],\r
you’ve\r
probably\r
never\r
caught\r
a\r
wild\r
Pokémon, right?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_rival_22:
I’ll show you the ropes before I take you to the
academy. Come with me![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0090_head_teacher_15:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Do be careful on the way to school,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
